title: Business Development Awareness static single-page landing

requirements.summary: Implement the single-page landing layout (header, anchor nav, five topic cards with exact IDs, footer) in React + TypeScript.
acceptanceCriteria: The app renders a single page titled “Business Development Awareness”.
The top navigation contains links labeled: “Share Market”, “Trading”, “E-Commerce”, “Dropshipping”, “Import & Export”.
Clicking each nav link scrolls to the corresponding section on the same page using the exact IDs: #share, #trading, #ecommerce, #dropshipping, #importexport.
The page includes five visible content cards with the same headings and paragraph content as the user-provided HTML.
The footer text shows: “© 2026 Business Awareness | Learn • Grow • Succeed”.

file_operations.description: Create the static single-page layout in React/TSX: header (title/subtitle), anchor-based nav, main content with five topic card sections using the exact IDs (share, trading, ecommerce, dropshipping, importexport) and the same headings/paragraph text as the provided HTML, plus the required footer text.

Create a small presentational component to render a topic card section (heading + paragraphs) while preserving the exact user-provided content and ensuring the section wrapper carries the required anchor ID.
Wire the new BusinessAwarenessLanding page as the sole rendered view to satisfy the single-page requirement (no additional routes/pages introduced).
Ensure the document title remains exactly “Business Development Awareness” and aligns with the rendered page content.

requirements.summary: Apply Tailwind styling to match the provided CSS intent (colors, centered max-width layout, card styling, responsive wrapping nav).
acceptanceCriteria: Background color is a light gray equivalent to #f4f6f9.
Header and footer use a dark navy tone equivalent to #0d47a1 with white text.
Nav bar uses a navy tone equivalent to #1565c0; nav items have a hover state that darkens similarly to the header color.
Main content is centered with a max width around 900px and comfortable padding.
Each topic card is white, rounded (~8px), has a soft shadow, and has spacing between cards.
On small screens, the nav items wrap and remain clickable without overlapping.

file_operations.description: Add Tailwind classes to implement: light-gray page background, navy header/footer with white text, slightly lighter navy nav with hover-darkening, centered content container (approx ~900px max width), and white rounded cards with subtle shadow; ensure nav uses flex-wrap and spacing for small screens.

Set global/base styling to support the page background and consistent defaults (e.g., body background color equivalent to #f4f6f9 and base text color), while relying on Tailwind utilities for component-level styling.
Extend Tailwind theme tokens (e.g., custom navy shades and optional container sizing) to make the required color palette and max-width behavior easy to apply consistently via utilities.

requirements.summary: Establish and apply a coherent theme (typography, spacing, interactive states) consistently across the single-page layout while keeping all text in English and preserving all five topics.
acceptanceCriteria: A single, consistent theme is applied across header/nav/cards/footer (typography, spacing, hover/focus states).
No content sections are removed; the five topics remain present and readable.

file_operations.description: Normalize typography scale (title/subtitle/section headings/body), spacing rhythm, and interactive states (hover/focus-visible for nav links) using Tailwind utilities; keep all user-facing text in English and preserve the meaning/content of all five sections.
Define consistent global typography defaults (font stack, base line-height) and focus styling support to ensure a cohesive theme across the page without altering read-only UI component files.
